name: Balloon to the Moon 2
summary: Balloon to the Moon 2 is a Semi-Open World Retro Style Platformer inspired by Jet Set Willy. After the First Game, Peter made it to the Moon but is then greeted by the moon's Inhabitants. Which are humans with rabbit ears. The Moon Rabbit Princess offers you to live with them if you can complete a trail to grab all the moon treasures scattered throughout the moon. You will have to navigate several areas to grab all the treasures.
